mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project ( proj_no, proj_user_id, proj_division, proj_title, proj_annostart, proj_annoend, proj_startdate, proj_enddate, proj_location, proj_detail, proj_viewcount) VALUES ( seq_project_proj_no.nextval, #{projUserId:VARCHAR}, #{projDivision:NUMERIC}, #{projTitle:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{projAnnoEnd:DATE}, #{projStartDate:DATE}, #{projEndDate:DATE}, #{projLocation:VARCHAR}, #{projDetail:VARCHAR}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT p.proj_no, p.proj_user_id, p.proj_division, p.proj_title, p.proj_annostart, p.proj_annoend, p.proj_startdate, p.proj_enddate, p.proj_location, p.proj_detail, p.proj_viewcount, round((TO_DATE(concat(p.proj_enddate,'235959'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')-TO_DATE(p.proj_startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))) as proj_expectdate, round((TO_DATE(concat(p.proj_annoend,'235959'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')-TO_DATE(p.proj_annostart,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))) as proj_dday, a.scrap_no FROM project p , (SELECT * FROM scrap WHERE user_id=#{scrapUserId:VARCHAR}) a WHERE p.proj_no=a.proj_no(+) AND p.proj_no=#{projNo}

SELECT p.proj_no, p.proj_user_id, p.proj_division, p.proj_title, p.proj_annostart, p.proj_annoend, p.proj_startdate, p.proj_enddate, p.proj_location, concat(substr(proj_detail, 1, 120) ,'...')as proj_detail, p.proj_viewcount, round((TO_DATE(concat(p.proj_enddate,'235959'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')-TO_DATE(p.proj_startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))) as proj_expectdate, round((TO_DATE(concat(p.proj_annoend,'235959'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')-TO_DATE(p.proj_annostart,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))) as proj_dday, a.scrap_no FROM project p , (SELECT scrap_no, proj_no FROM scrap WHERE user_id=#{scrapUserId}) a
p.proj_no=a.proj_no(+) And
p.proj_division IN (11,12)
p.proj_division IN (21,22)
p.proj_division = #{projDivision}
AND p.proj_title like '%' || #{search.searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND p.proj_location like '%' || #{search.searchKeyword} ||'%'
ORDER BY proj_annostart DESC
ORDER BY proj_dday ASC
ORDER BY proj_ViewCount DESC

SELECT c.com_no, c.com_proj_no, c.com_user_id, c.com_proj_regdate, c.com_proj_content, u.user_id, u.user_img FROM proj_comment c, users u WHERE c.com_proj_no = #{comProjNo} AND u.user_id = c.com_user_id ORDER BY com_proj_regdate DESC
